questionnaire.question: Why are you here today ?
questionnaire.explanation: In open ended questonnaires, the users will be able to enter the answer as text in the given text box.

questionnaire.question: Choose your request type
questionnaire.explanation:
In single choice questionnaires, we let users pick any one option.(Options are displayed as boxes in this example.
The options can be either in boxes or in text)

questionnaire.question: Which domain does your business belong to?
questionnaire.explanation: In this questionnaire type we let users pick any one option or let them enter their answers as text in the given text box.

questionnaire.question: For which question set your raising this request for ?
questionnaire.explanation: User wil be redirected to a URL and will pick an item from that external URL, this will load a question set in JSON, In question set load, we construct & Invoke a URL from a external site - say http:\\localhost\LS123 and get a json responce with a question set
questionnaire.answer_ui: Just redirect and loading responce question set

questionnaire.question: What are the top 3 features you will look for, when buying a laptop ?
questionnaire.explanation: For multiple choice questionnaires, we let users pick one or more answers from the given options.

questionnaire.question: What is the desired screen size for your laptop ?
questionnaire.options:
Screen Size 1
Screen Size 2
Screen size 3
Screen Size 4
questionnaire.explanation: We let users pick any one option from the given drop down list

questionnaire.question: Which laptop brand do you prefer to buy ?
questionnaire.explanation: For image choice questionnaires, all answer options will be provided as images and we let users pick an option

questionnaire.question: How do you like to prioritize your prefernces while ordering for a lpatop ?
questionnaire.explanation: We will provide a set of options for the user and we let them prioritize or rank the options based on their preferences by just clicking on it. For example when user clicks on Design, design will be given the first priority and so on...

questionnaire.question: How much time do you spend daily using your laptop ?
questionnaire.explanation: Ratio scale is a type of variable measurement scale where options are quantitative in nature. We let users choose an option from the given list.

questionnaire.question: Would you like to go ahead and place an order for your laptop ?
questionnaire.explanation: User can choose between "Yes" or "No" option. We just offer two possible answers for the user to choose from.

questionnaire.question: Attach documents that support your product.
questionnaire.explanation: We let users browse and attach a file.

questionnaire.question: Summary of choices made
questionnaire.explanation: user will see entire question set and their choices
questionnaire.answer_ui: Full List with page by page display

questionnaire.question: Confirmation popup message
questionnaire.explanation: user will see a confirmation of choices made
